title: Second Declension Nouns (Masculine & Neuter)
learning_objectives: Identify second declension masculine nouns (-us, -er) and neuter nouns (-um)
Decline second declension nouns in all cases (singular and plural)
Translate sentences with mixed first and second declension nouns
Identify grammatical gender vs. natural gender
